Text:
When you ignore the virusalert, apply the patch, and when finished delete patch.exe it all works fine and no virus is found.
works fine.
why does symantics identify a virus?

why does symantics identify a virus?
What does Win32:Downloader-AS [trj] mean?

I saw that others said to ignore the virus warning so I tried to install the patch.  When I run it, it errors out.  I try to copy it into the game dir and it won't copy either.  The virus warning continues to come up.  Does anyone have a better place to get this patch, or any advice?
I got 98% and it stopped..what do i do now?

Avast! tagged this as a Trojan.  WTF, Vovik?

I know anti-v sometimes tags things as Trojans that are not, but Avast! is really good about identifying the real thing.

Thanks, but no thanks.  People, take care with this one.
